entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • APICompat not catching extracting a method from interface to 'base' interface #44426
  • Application Crash when libpng is installed on the system macOS Sequoia #44425

Closed

  • .NET 9.0 SDK is shipping unpatched copies of System.Text.Json #44197
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove net2.1 targets for test that's failing sometimes #44442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add *.props and *.targets to XML section of .editorconfig template #44441
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable VMR signing #44437
    untriaged, Area-VMR, 10.0.1xx
  • Correctly set ContinueOnError for RemoveDir when cleaning repos #44434
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Better structure VMR join points for resolvers #44428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add SDK support for rooting subsets of inputs in a composite image. #44436
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update checksum links to use SHA512 #44383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix official build. Correctly condition GenerateMSBuildExtensionsLayo… #44435
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Aspire fixes #44313
    untriaged, Aspire

Updated

  • [ADD] dotnet solution: Migrate #44419
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [FIX] tool-install: Use restore action config options #44309
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Javiercn/replace swa globbing #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Draft] Adding --format support to `dotnet new list` #44140
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
